original: Please enter the URL where you will host your verification metadata. In most cases, this will be the page you link to your MP3 file from.
translation: Entrez l'adresse URL où vous voulez stocker vos métadonnées de vérification. La plupart du temps, ce sera la page à partir de laquelle vous liez vos fichiers MP3.
Sauvegarder votre nom d'utilisateur et votre mot de passe ?

original: The selected file %s can not be found.
ccPublisher does not have sufficient permissions to read the selected files.
translation: ccPublisher n'a pas les permissions suffisantes pour lire les fichiers sélectionnés.
Utilisateur ou mot de passe incorrect.

original: Unable to connect to the Internet Archive to verify username and password.
That identifier does not conform to the Internet Archive's naming standards.
Enter your Internet Archive username and password.  If you do not have a username and password, visit http://archive.org to create an account.
Unable to write to the selected file.
You must supply a description of at least 5 words.
Upload works to the Internet Archive (www.archive.org).
Create metadata suitable for use with files hosted on your web site.
Metadata helps others to find your works.
Keywords help users find works by topic.
licensed under the GNU GPL version 2.0
After you paste the verification text into your web page, your file is ready to file share; just drop it in your shared folder.
1) Drag and drop your audio or video files
translation: 1) Glissez-déplacez vos fichiers audio ou vidéo.

original: You can view your work online shortly at:

3) Optionally send your Creative Commons licensed files to the Internet Archive, a free hosting service

ccPublisher has assembled a suggested identifier based on the metadata you provided.  Identifiers must be at least five characters long and may contains upper and lower case letters (A-Z, a-z), digits (0-9), underscores (_) and periods(.).  You may change it now; click Next to verify it is available.
4) Get a URL where you and your friends can download your file
translation: 4) Obtenez une URL à partir de laquelle vous et vos amis pouvez accéder au fichier

original: Is this file Creative Commons licensed?
Every item in the Internet Archive has a unique identifier which forms a portion of the URL.  This identifier can not be changed after your work is submitted to the Internet Archive.
